publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3647 Donald Gorrie: Asthma UK Scotland Initiative, Out There and Active—That the Parliament supports the exciting Asthma UK Scotland initiative, Out There and Active, which promotes exercise for the 100,000 children in Scotland with asthma; welcomes the initiative as an important step towards improving the health of all children, and calls on schools who receive the Out There and Active material to display it prominently so that no child with asthma is excluded from taking part in sport at school. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3647 Asthma UK Scotland Initiative, Out There and Active (lodged on 29 November 2005) Carolyn Leckie*

S2M-3647 Donald Gorrie: Asthma UK Scotland Initiative, Out There and Active—That the Parliament supports the exciting Asthma UK Scotland initiative, Out There and Active, which promotes exercise for the 100,000 children in Scotland with asthma; welcomes the initiative as an important step towards improving the health of all children, and calls on schools who receive the Out There and Active material to display it prominently so that no child with asthma is excluded from taking part in sport at school. Supported by: Carolyn Leckie, Mr Jim Wallace*, Fergus Ewing*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Euan Robson*, Campbell Martin*, Colin Fox*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr David Davidson*, Mary Scanlon*, Rob Gibson*, Alex Neil*, Bruce Crawford*, Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Patrick Harvie*, Murray Tosh*, Tommy Sheridan*, Bill Butler*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Margaret Smith*, Shiona Baird*, Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Ms Sandra White*, Margo MacDonald*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Nora Radcliffe*, Fiona Hyslop*, Karen Gillon*
S2M-3647 Asthma UK Scotland Initiative, Out There and Active (lodged on 29 November 2005) Phil Gallie*, Pauline McNeill*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-3647 Asthma UK Scotland Initiative, Out There and Active (lodged on 29 November 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3647 Asthma UK Scotland Initiative, Out There and Active (lodged on 29 November 2005) Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-3647 Asthma UK Scotland Initiative, Out There and Active (lodged on 29 November 2005) Susan Deacon*, John Swinburne*
